title: Bloodroot
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out
description: Feminist collective restaurant and bookstore since 1977. Offers seasonal vegetarian menus using fresh organic produce. Sunday is brunch. Self service casual atmosphere. There's no cash register and no waitressing. Place your order with a woman seated behind a desk after making your choice from the blackboard menu, and bus your own table when you are through.
